At Ambient.ai, we're looking for exceptional software engineers, both on-site (San Francisco Bay Area) and remote, to join our engineering team and change the future of computer vision.

Ambient.ai is an early-stage, stealth-mode company founded by Stanford alumni with a mission to solve general vision AI and achieve human-level visual intelligence. We're using cutting-edge deep learning and computer vision to solve an incredibly important real-world problem. We're backed by YC (W17), Stanford StartX, SV Angel, Inevitable Ventures, among others.

Weâ€™re hiring in two roles for our early engineering team:

1) Full-Stack Software Engineer: You take pride in the breadth of your skills and work across the whole stack: frontend, backend, microservices and databases. You can design and implement complex backend architectures, write clean and maintainable APIs, design database schemas, implement and deploy distributed systems and have the ability to learn new web frameworks quickly and often.

2) Applied Deep Learning Engineer: You have a penchant for turning research ideas into products. You are well versed with latest computer vision research and have the ability to prototype and productionize deep neural networks under strict time constraints.

(You can read more about the roles here: https://ambient.ai/careers)

This is a unique opportunity to be a part of our journey early on and build a breakthrough product in the computer vision space. Apply by sending your resume to careers@ambient.ai
